name: django-storybook
description: Django-native Storybook for building design systems with multi-framework adapters and shared recipe CSS

scripts.build:storybook:bundle: npx esbuild static/js/storybookReact.js --bundle --minify --outfile=static/js/storybookReact.bundle.js && npx esbuild static/js/core.js --bundle --minify --outfile=static/js/core.bundle.js
scripts.build:storybook: npm run build:storybook:registry && npm run build:storybook:bundle
